      • setOutputDirectory

        public void setOutputDirectory(String outputDirectoryPath)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException,
                               SecurityException
        Parameters:
        outputDirectoryPath - may be empty or null, in which case the current working directory is used
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided path points to a File and not a Directory
        SecurityException - if the File System has issues

      • process

        public void process(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jcas)
        Process the jcas and write sentence property lists to file. Filename is based upon the document id stored in the cas
        Parameters:
        jcas - ye olde ...

      • writeSentence

        public static void writeSentence(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jcas,
                                 org.apache.uima.cas.text.AnnotationFS sentence,
                                 BufferedWriter writer)
                          throws IOException
        Write a sentence and list of event and anatomical site properties from the document text
        Parameters:
        jcas - ye olde ...
        sentence - annotation containing the sentence
        writer - writer to which property lists for the sentence should be written
        Throws:
        IOException - if the writer has issues
